qas.question: In what year did Bell officially become an American?
Besides the US and UK, what other country claims Bell as a citizen?
What does Bell call people who are citizens of two countries?

context: Bell was a <a1_0>British<a1_0/> subject throughout his early life in Scotland and later in <a2_0>Canada<a2_0/> until <a0_0>1882<a0_0/>, when he became a naturalized citizen of the United States. In 1915, he characterized his status as: "I am not one of those <a3_0>hyphenated<a3_0/> Americans who claim allegiance to two countries." Despite this declaration, Bell has been proudly claimed as a "native son" by all three countries he resided in: the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom.
